pr_title: [BEAM-9980] do not hardcode Python version for cross language tests and make it switchable.

timeline.message: [BEAM-9980] do not hardcode Python version for cross language tests and make it switchable.
[BEAM-9980] do not hardcode Python version for cross language tests and make it switchable.
[BEAM-9980] do not hardcode Python version for cross language tests and make it switchable.

timeline.bodyText:
Thanks a lot!
I think we should make some constants like
LOWEST_SUPPORTED = 3.6
HIGHEST_SUPPORTED = 3.8
ESSENTIAL_VERSIONS = [LOWEST_SUPPORTED, HIGHEST_SUPPORTED]

We can also do it in another PR.
timeline.author: tvalentyn

replies.bodyText: Sure, I created PR about this; #13349
replies.author: lazylynx
